title: Bug 6304 cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the context menu does not show the 'Team' entry.
EB: The 'Team' entry should be visible in the context menu when attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource.
SR:
1. Open the context menu.
2. Check for the presence of the 'Team' entry.
